item.title: Stellar Blade Director Reveals His Game of the Year
item.description:
Summary

  • Stellar Blade director praises Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and declares it his Game of the Year for 2025.
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 sold over 2 million copies within 12 days of launch.
  • The game features engaging combat and storytelling and is currently the highest-rated game of 2025 so far.

The director of Stellar Blade , Kim Hyung-tae, has revealed that his current pick for Game of the Year is the hit title Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 . Stellar Blade is an action-adventure title that released on April 26, 2024, for PlayStation 5 and will be receiving a PC port in June 2025.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been a massive success for Sandfall Interactive, as it managed to sell over two million copies within 12 days of its debut. While there are no solid numbers to report, it's likely that the game has attracted many more players, as it is also available on Game Pass for Xbox Series X/S and PC. The game is so popular that physical editions are currently selling out, and even scalpers are trying to take advantage of the situation.

In a recent post on Twitter, Kim Hyung-tae, the director of the popular action game Stellar Blade , shared that Clair Obscur : Expedition 33 is his current pick for Game of the Year in 2025. He said that he finished the popular turn-based RPG in 96 hours and thanked Sandfall Interactive for a great experience. He even managed to earn the Platinum for the popular title, meaning he completed just about everything there is to do in the game.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Is Stellar Blade Directorâ€™s Game of the Year

While it's still only May, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is currently the highest-rated game of 2025 so far and is sitting at a score of 92 on OpenCritic. Many fans have praised the game for its incredible storytelling and engaging combat, which puts its own unique spin on the typical turn-based formula. Instead of traditional turn-based combat, the hit title weaves in dodging, parrying, and counterattacking, creating a unique experience that some people have even compared to rhythm games. Numerous gamers have pointed out that, no matter how desperate a fight may seem, the ability to parry and counterattack keeps hope alive and can turn a dire run into a successful one.

Unfortunately, Sandfall Interactive recently shared information that disappointed some members of the community, as it stated that there are currently no DLC plans for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 . Instead, the developers want to focus on improving the base game and are listening to feedback from players. While some people were disappointed, many praised the developers for prioritizing the main game over any kind of expansion. With a whole world to explore and plenty of content to experience, many fans are enjoying their time with the popular turn-based RPG.

item.title: Pokemon Fan Designs Mega Evolution for Eelektross
item.description:
Summary

  • A Pokemon fan created a Mega Evolution for Eelektross, showcasing a more fierce and bipedal design with bigger claws.
  • Eelektross is the final evolution of Tynamo in Pokemon, evolving from Eelektrik after being exposed to a Thunder Stone.
  • Other fans have also created unique Mega Evolutions, like Mega Gastrodon and Mega Arbok, generating positive fan reception.

A Pokemon fan has recently devised a new Mega Evolution for Eelektross, an eel-inspired Electric-type critter. This fan art is the latest work of a prolific fan who often engages with the Pokemon community by showing the amazing works that they create.

Eelektross was originally introduced in the fifth generation of Pokemon games. Itâ€™s the final evolution of Tynamo, which can evolve into Eelektrik starting at Level 39. After that, Eelektrik can finally become Eelektross by being exposed to a Thunder Stone. Eelektross has access to powerful Electric-type moves such as Discharge and Wild Charge, as well as a few Poison and Normal-type moves, which can be useful in combat.

Now, a prolific Pokemon fan artist called El-psy-congroo-01 has shared a Mega Evolution of Eelektross with the community. The new design uses similar colors, but adds some light blue scales. Mega Eelektross also stands out due to having bigger claws and being bipedal with a much more pronounced mouth than its original counterpart, as well as a fiercer appearance. El-psy-congroo-01â€™s post was quite successful, with multiple fans complimenting how good the new take on the popular creature looked.

Pokemon Fan's Amazing Mega Eelektross Art

This is not the first time that El-psy-congroo-01 has created an amazing Mega Evolution of a beloved critter and shared it with the community, as the fan has done so many times in the past. One recent example of this is the couple of Mega Gastrodons created by the artist, which reimagined both the West and East Sea versions of the creature.

There are many recent examples of amazing fan art depicting Mega Evolutions created by other artists, too. For example, one fan recently created a Mega Evolution for Arbok, which depicted the purple snake-inspired critter as a huge monstrosity with two mouths and scales that looked like huge eyes popping out of its chest, achieving quite a successful reception with the fanbase.

Last month, yet another fan devised Mega Evolutions for the Pokemon Legends: Z-A starters, coming up with unique buffed versions of Feraligatr, Emboar, and Meganium. While most of these critters were still easy to recognize, Mega Emboar was pretty unique, as it only used the overall shape of the creature, turning it into a big black monster with enormous flames around it. Hopefully, other fans will continue to come up with amazing designs and share them with the community ahead of the launch of the eagerly awaited Pokemon Legends: Z-A .

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Director Reveals the First RPG He Ever Played
item.description:
Summary

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 director Guillaume Broche says that his first JRPG was Final Fantasy 8.
  • The developer played it when he was too young to read, but it still left a huge impression.
  • Expedition 33 is a strong contender for 2025's Game of the Year.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 director Guillaume Broche has revealed that the first JRPG he ever played was Final Fantasy 8 . The story was revealed in a recent interview, in which Broche discussed his early experiences with Japanese role-playing games that shaped the development of his first title as a game director. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 launched to the public on April 24 and is available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has drawn immense attention for its strong JRPG inspirations and amazing story. The game is set in a world with surreal French landscapes combined with influences from Japanese role-playing titles. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is already considered a contender, if not an all-out favorite, for the 2025 Game of the Year award. This is an incredibly impressive feat for an indie game, particularly this early in the year.

Related
Robert Pattinson certainly looks the part for a Clair Obscur TV adaptation

Like many others, I quickly noticed that Gustave looks a LOT like Robert Pattinson, so a TV adaptation would work in his favor. Do you think he could play the role well? Pattinson aside, who could you see playing the various roles in an adaptation?

In an interview with The Washington Post, Broche recalled playing Final Fantasy 8 at a very young age. He and his brother couldn't read well yet, making the text-heavy game harder for the 7-year-old and his co-op partner. As big of an impact as the title seems to have had on him, one particular point stood out to Broche. The only mechanic they could use was an auto-attack, which made the first boss encounter nearly impossible to clear.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Embodies Decades of JRPG Influence

Despite troubles playing his first JRPG, Broche was left with a lasting impression that not only made him fall in love with the genre but ultimately affected his professional trajectory. Broche grew up in an environment in which anime, manga, and Japanese video games were readily available. He went on to explore a wide range of JRPGs, including Persona , Suikoden , and Atelier . According to the French game developer, all these games shaped Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 , ranging from narrative choices to visual art.

Broche's vision has certainly worked out. With massive demand on various game platforms, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 was released on Game Pass as a day-one title, and quickly reached over 100,000 simultaneous players on Steam. There's no question that it is now among the most hyped games on the planet, despite its humble beginnings.

With massive billion-dollar franchises dominating much of the market, an independent game like Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has captured the imaginations of gamers in a very real way. It offers a fresh take on a proven concept that draws from Broche's personal experience. It's a great reminder that the RPG genre is ultimately rooted in storytelling, which is made ever better with a more personal touch.

item.title: Roblox: Type Rune Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Type Rune Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Type Rune
  • How to Get More Type Rune Codes

Type Rune is an adventure Roblox RPG based on the Bleach anime where you will play the role of Quincy, Hollow, or Soul Reaper. Here you will find spectacular battles, a bunch of character improvement systems, and hours of grinding to achieve the best possible result.

To make your task easier, you can redeem Type Rune codes that will bring you tons of different freebies. Each code offers unique rewards, such as resources, currency, or even elixirs, which will greatly help you in your adventures.

Updated May 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Type Rune has a solid selection of codes that can give you an extra push as you play. Whether you're after boosts, resources, or just want to see what each code unlocks, there's plenty to explore. Be sure to check in regularly so you donâ€™t miss any new opportunities.

Expired Type Rune Codes

There are currently no expired Type Rune codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Type Rune

Redeeming Type Rune codes is easy and will not take you much time, especially if you have done similar things in other Roblox games before. If you donâ€™t have much experience, don't worry, because we have prepared detailed instructions on how to proceed:

  • Launch Type Rune .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be a button with a gift icon. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Accept button below it. Now, copy and paste one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Accept button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Type Rune Codes

You can easily find more Type Rune codes on the game's official Discord server. Developers often share new Roblox promo codes, and you can easily find them in a special dedicated section or in the community chat.

item.title: Roblox: Gorilla vs Humans Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Gorilla vs Humans Codes
  • How to Redeem Gorilla vs Humans Codes
  • How to Get New Gorilla vs Humans Codes

There are many exciting games that you can find on the Roblox platform, and if you're looking for an asymmetrical PvP experience, Gorilla vs Humans might be of interest to you. In this game, one player controls a giant gorilla with various powerful abilities, and the rest of the server tries to take this creature down. There are also special coupons that you can use to get free rewards. Here we will tell you about Gorilla vs Humans promo codes and how to activate them.

All Gorilla vs Humans Codes

Working Gorilla vs Humans Codes

  • 5MVISITS â€“ Gives you x500 Coins

Expired Gorilla vs Humans Codes

  • 32500LIKES
  • 30000LIKES
  • 27500LIKES
  • 25000LIKES
  • 22500LIKES
  • 20000LIKES
  • 5000LIKES
  • 4000LIKES
  • 3000LIKES
  • 2000LIKES
  • 1000LIKES
  • 500LIKES
  • RELEASE

Promo codes in Gorilla vs Humans are quite useful and provide you with great rewards. Coins are one of the most valuable things you can get in this game, and they can be obtained by redeeming coupons. With this currency, you can purchase new human weapons or gorilla abilities. So, Coins can help you progress faster in this experience, and we highly recommend that you activate all the promo codes that give them.

How to Redeem Gorilla vs Humans Codes

The rewards you can get by activating Gorilla vs Humans codes are useful, but if you want to claim them, you will have to learn how the redemption process works. Fortunately, it's not that difficult in this Roblox game, and you just need to do a couple of things to unlock this feature. Follow the steps below to redeem Gorilla vs Humans codes:

  • Open the Gorilla vs Humans page on the Roblox website.
  • Join the 9to5 Games Roblox Community and like the game.
  • Launch Gorilla vs Humans and wait for the experience to load.
  • After that, open the Shop by clicking on the button on the left side of your screen.
  • In the Shop menu, scroll down to the bottom until you see the line where you can type codes.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the line we mentioned.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Gorilla vs Humans Codes

The developers of Gorilla vs Humans regularly add Roblox promo codes, and we will keep you updated on all new rewards. So, you can bookmark our guide and check it from time to time for such bonuses. Also, you can follow the official media related to this game:

  • Discord Server
